text: Barnens brevlåda was a Swedish children's radio programme. It was led by Sven Jerring. It aired totally 1 785 times between 11 September 1925 and 1972. When airing for last time, it was the longest-lasting Swedish radio programme of that time. The record was broken on 14 November 1999 by the programme Smoke Rings. ==References== Category:Radio programs Category:1925 establishments in Sweden Category:1972 disestablishments Category:Entertainment in Sweden
title: Barnens brevlåda
